DOC.brief_summary: This research study conduct investigate skin irritancy potential new medication contain two active ingredient ( diclofenac menthol ) together gel formulation develop treat mild moderate pain inflammation , acute sport injury , sprain strain .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Study Investigate Skin Irritancy Potential Diclofenac-Menthol Gel
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 36 healthy subject volunteer expose seven test product ( study treatment gel six control product ) simultaneously 21 consecutive day . The seven test product apply use 7-channel patch assembly affix infrascapular area back subject approximately 24 hour daily . The subject return clinic undergo skin irritation assessment approximately 24 hour time patch assembly initially affixed . During visit , doctor train staff member examine sign irritation ( ) skin test product apply . The skin irritation assessment primarily characterize test product individually term symptomatology use 7-point categorical scale range 1 ( glaze and/or wrinkle ) 7 ( erosion and/or vesiculation ) .
DOC.criteria: Male/female volunteer â‰¥18 year No systemic/dermatologic disorder Visible skin disease site application might interfere skin assessment Allergy hypersensitivity NSAIDs menthol excipients test product History physical psychiatric illness , medical disorder Recent history alcohol drug abuse Pregnant lactating female
